InstallationÂ¶

So, you want to try Sphinxit? Good! Installation is simple as always with pip:

$ pip install sphinxit

Do it in your project`s virtualenv... you know. Or, you can grab latest code from Github. Just:

$ pip install -e git+https://github.com/semirook/sphinxit#egg=sphinxit

The only dependency of Sphinxit is MySQLdb library. Usually it`s python-mysqldb package and you can install it with your system package manager or with pip, but it`s not true for all systems. For OS X it`s mysql-python package, for example. Maybe, MySQLdb is already installed in your system, check it.

What`s next? Visit Quickstart to learn more.
